segments.text: I'm just taking in all the details of this drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the open cabinet doors on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, there's a large jar clearly labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And it's completely filled with cookies, what a sight!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is incredibly agile, climbing on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's already got one hand deep in the jar, grabbing them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, anticipating her share, it's quite a team effort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, with the woman totally distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's actually quite impressive how coordinated they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies they'll manage to get away with.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The audacity of it, right under the nose of the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't heard them or noticed the open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR
